title: League of Legends on my Mac suddenly stopped working. Please help. (Before Sugar Rush!!!!!!)
body:
Today I was opening my client, after the Userkernel finished opening and it was about to go to the patcher, it said it suddenly stopped working.  It continuously kept stopping, which was not the case last night.  This happened after it suddenly kicked me out of the client, which it has been doing for some time but I never really thought of as an issue until now.  I then went and deleted the game, and went to re-download it, but after I downloaded it, and moved it into the applications folder, when I clicked on it, it would ask me to select a folder in applications, so I went and created an empty folder for it, and after that it would begin to run.  It opened the UserKernel and began loading the LoLLauncher.  Once the patcher finished loading it would immediately shut down, saying the LoLPatcher quit unexpectedly.

I do not know what to do and I really want to get back to playing it hopefully before the double ip weekend.  

By the way, this isn't a toaster, it is a more recent Mac Laptop that can run the game at 50 fps.  
{{champion:131}}

replies.body:
Same thing with me.. =(
I restarted my computer, didn't work. I deleted and re-downloaded League, didn't work.
(update) I've also tried on a whole different computer itself, still nothing.
{{champion:61}}
Same thing here (frist they reset my rank and now i cant play riot plz fix D:)

Thank goodness I bought the skins I wanted right before it happened lol but yeah my team needs me for ranked and I can't get on :c is league doing anything to fix it yet?
{{champion:61}}

My patcher won't open at all; instead, it gives a "LoLPatcher quit unexpectedly" error (which says "EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGSEGV)") and attempts to send information to Apple.  This has happened at least 10 times today and I've uninstalled LOL completely a few times.
What version of OSX are you running?
Im running OSX 10.9.4 and still can't get on

We aren't supporting 10.6.8 anymore. You can upgrade to 10.7 for about 20 dollars. More info about it can be found here:

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=46513660
https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26564905-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements

For the past 4ish months since support for 10.6 was dropped LoL has run fine for users of the older operating system.  This is the first problem.

What I'd really like to see answered is this:  What new feature(s) from 10.7 are being used by LoL as of this patch?  If the outdated version really is the problem here there must be some new technology that is employed (probably in the new launcher) and there's nothing that can be done.

We are no longer supporting 10.6.8. You can upgrade to 10.7 for $20

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=46513660
https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26564905-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements
Totally upgraded to Maverick and it worked.  Plus it was free!!  :D

Hey Mac peeps, what are you system specs? Here's a template you can fill out to help me triage your problems:


Server: 
Type of Bug: 
Description: 
Video / Screenshot: 
Steps to reproduce: 
Expected result: 
Observed result: 
Reproduction rate: 
System specs: 

If you're actually getting to the patcher and crashing while patching, please send me your logs. You can attach them to this thread. There are 2 ways to get your logs:

Method 1 (Easiest):
Open Patcher
Go to Options (Gear icon on top right of Patcher)
Click on Save Logs

Method 2:

Go to:
Finder --> Applications (or wherever you installed LoL) --> (control + click) on LoL and select Show Package Contents
Then go to:
Contents --> LoL --> Logs --> Patcher Logs

Send me your latest LoLPatcher.log file and launcher.log files.
I dont have a mac and its not getting past the first appearence of the word league of legends that pops uo just before updater that is in middle of screen

This patch is about 280 megabytes so give it some time to patch. This patch includes a visual update to the patcher so it's going to take some time to get from the minilauncher (league of legends logo w/ mini progress bar) to the actual patcher. Be patient plz :)

As an aside, it would probably be a good idea to publicise that fact a little more; I've been playing over a year and never had the mini progress bar appear like that without anything else; didn't even know it existed until now. Thanks for letting us know though, I was worried i'd have to spend all day re-downloading!

Server: NA
Type of Bug: LoLPatcher Quitting 
Description: LoLPatcher Crashes after User Kernel Opens
Video / Screenshot:
Steps to reproduce: Open League Client from Applications Folder
Expected result: To Open League game and start 4.15 Patch
Observed result: LoLPatcher quits unexpectedly
Reproduction rate: 100%
System specs: Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 320M, Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, Memory 4 GB 1067 MHz DDR3,  Mac OS X Version 10.6.8.
Wait, might being on update 10.6.8 have anything to do with it?

For some reason, I do not have the LoLPatcher.log file, I have the 3 launcher.log files though, ill try to send them to you. Just getting used to boards lol.

(Edit)- It wont let me attach the files for some reason, unless I'm not doing it right. But, as I said, It will not go to the patcher, it will just quit out while in the blank screen between the LoL logo and the Patcher.
JUST WOULD LIKE TO SAY THANK YOU TO RIOT FOR CLARIFYING THE ISSUE
HA HA HA. GUYS. We messed up.  In April they told us 10.6.8 would no longer be supported. I had totally forgot. You can upgrade to 10.9 Mavericks for free or go to Lion (10.7) for $20.

Steps to reproduce:  Attempt to open LoL
Expected result:  Launcher and/or patcher loads and patches
Observed result:  Patcher quits unexpectedly
Reproduction rate: 100%
System specs:
Model: iMac7,1, BootROM IM71.007A.B03, 2 processors, Intel Core 2 Duo, 2 GHz, 4 GB, SMC 1.20f4
Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 XT, ATI,RadeonHD2400, PCIe, 128 MB
Memory Module: global_name
AirPort: spairport_wireless_card_type_airport_extreme (0x14E4, 0x88), Broadcom BCM43xx 1.0 (5.10.131.42.4)
Bluetooth: Version 2.4.5f3, 2 service, 19 devices, 1 incoming serial ports
Network Service: Built-in Ethernet, Ethernet, en0
Network Service: AirPort, AirPort, en1
Serial ATA Device: ST3250820AS Q, 232.89 GB
Parallel ATA Device: OPTIARC  DVD RW AD-5630A

Hope this helps

Totally seeing the same issue.  I logged on early to make sure I had the patch downloaded for game night.  Hopefully its fixed before we get started later...

Ive been having the same problem with my mac today, i try to load in and the patcher stops out of no where and shuts down on me. id like to get back to playing league, i mean honestly its what i do whenever i have the free time, ive sunk some money into the game itself, and i was really looking forward to the candy rush weekend double XP. Also was going to purchase some skins, RIOT please hep us mac users, we are begging you. Make the game equally for Mac and Pc users alike XD till then ill be {{champion:150}}ling my way through whatever pass time activity can compete with league.... please fix it fast
